## Last Verse
<!--Put a short poem of your choice 8-20 lines,here!-->
Where can I go  
without my mount   
all eager and quick   
How will I know     
in thicket ahead  
is danger or treasure     
when Body my good     
bright dog is dead  
  
How will it be  
to lie in the sky  
without roof or door     
and wind for an eye  
  
With cloud for shift
